name: Lightly
headline: Help ML teams label the right data
description: When ML teams send their data to companies like Scale.ai for labeling, most can only afford to label 1% or less of their datasets.  But today they don’t have a good way to pick which 1% to label. We help them pick the best 1% of their data to label.  By labeling the most representative data, they significantly improve model accuracy at the same cost.

founders.name: Igor Susmelj, Founder
founders.description: Igor has more than five years of experience in machine learning. He holds a degree in electrical engineering from ETH Zurich. During his studies, he developed a lot of experience in machine learning and robotics and had multiple successful publications in the area of deep learning at top conferences such as ICML and ECCV. He previously worked for two years at the Swiss stock exchange as a software engineer.

founders.name: Matthias Heller, Founder
founders.description: Co-Founder at Lightly.ai. Previously worked at BCG, startups, and in finance. Studied at HSG, Harvard, and HEC Paris.

## Get the most out of your data
[Lightly**Edge**![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62cd5ce03261cba217188442/66e5776e9101468db7a89bdf_PREVIEW-NEW%20\(1\)-min.jpg)**Smart Data Capturing on Device** Find only the most valuable data directly on device‍](https://lightly.ai/</lightlyedge>)
[Lightly**One**![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62cd5ce03261cba217188442/640fa9ba4ff79e83b6113f80_embedding_selection-v5.gif)**Data Selection & Data Viewer**Get data insights and find the perfect selection strategy‍‍](https://lightly.ai/</lightlyone>)
[Lightly**Train**![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62cd5ce03261cba217188442/66e61828f5b5b2f7e9d52229_BRAIN1.svg)**Self-Supervised Pretraining** Leverage self-supervised learning to pretrain models](https://lightly.ai/</lightlytrain>)
## We help customers to have up to
92% 
### less labeling costs
Data redundancy can not only hurt model performance but also create significant costs for data labeling, storage, and compute.
19%
### better models
Selecting the most valuable training data to achieve significant gains in accuracy. Leverage active- and self-supervised learning.
2.1x
### faster retraining cycles
Manage your data and machine learning pipeline efficiently and leave hacky in-house solutions behind for a scalable solution.
[Data InsightsImprove your model by better understanding your data distribution, mitigating bias, and identify edge-cases](https://lightly.ai/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)[Smart Data SelectionUse a combination of model predictions, embeddings, and metadata to reach your desired data model training distribution](https://lightly.ai/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)[Automate Pipeline ManagementManage data curation runs and keep track of new data for labeling and model training](https://lightly.ai/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)
![A gif showing how to explore and sort samples in your dataset using Lightly's UI](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62cd5ce03261cba217188442/62cd5ce03261cbe8c7188519_explore-embedding.gif)
Manage data curation runs and keep track of new data for labeling and model training
![Left side: python code with commands to run Lightly
Right side: Input/Output Dataset Class Distribution graph](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62cd5ce03261cba217188442/6362bad30946c4be8c18d4f1_02.png)
![Docker Run](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62cd5ce03261cba217188442/63298b112cb4e1ed145bbacb_RunyDockerRuny.png)

## What our customers say
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62cd5ce03261cb3e98188470/635a6fc3e14b8d25079500ef_image.png)
‍
 _"After training a model on the filtered data suggested by Lightly, I saw a dramatic increase in performance on our key metrics. Part of this is certainly because this was the first time we trained a model on any data that we've collected, but I'm fairly certain that performance would not have been as good if we had chosen what data to label at random."_
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62cd5ce03261cb3e98188470/6351151a7f7629023703ccc7_60f6b34933666d4e9f0b8836_angelo_headshot_high%20resolution.jpg)

Former Computer Vision Lead
CurbFlow

‍
 _“By integrating Lightly into our existing workflow, we achieved a 90% reduction in dataset size and doubled the efficiency of our deployment process. The tool’s seamless implementation significantly enhanced our data pipeline.”_
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62cd5ce03261cb3e98188470/66e7cdca765774715aa8feab_1723950755984.jpg)

Sr. Data Scientist
Aigen
[Case Study](https://lightly.ai/</case-studies/aigen>)

‍
 _"Through Lightly we were able to see, that a lot of data being collected was not meaningful enough for training an accurate model. This led us to change the way we gathered data and allowed us to ultimately create a much more information-dense and higher-quality dataset overall. Needless to say, the performance of our final model was greatly improved."_
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62cd5ce03261cb3e98188470/635115418bd992815cb884a9_60f6b34933666d5b030b883f_IMG_1180_v2-p-800.jpeg)

Autonomy Engineer

‍
"Through this collaboration, SDSC and Lightly have combined their expertise to revolutionize the process of frame selection in surgical videos, making it more efficient and accurate than ever before to find the best subset of frames for labeling and model training."
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62cd5ce03261cb3e98188470/65279b1a09ff78020dee6b45_margaux_massonforsythe.jpeg)
##### Margaux Masson-Forsythe
Director of Machine Learning
SDSC
[Case Study](https://lightly.ai/</case-studies/sdsc>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62cd5ce03261cb3e98188470/66edcb7c87b5e11dd3f05fa2_03-Logo-Lythium_colores-2.png)
‍
 _“Lightly gave us transparency to a part of the ML development that is a black box, data. Furthermore, Lightly enabled us to do Active Learning at scale and helped us improve recall and F1-score of our object detector by 32% and 10% compared to our previous data selection method. We finally saw the light in our data using Lightly.”_

I can recommend every MLOps team with a lot of data to integrate Lightly."_

## Integrate with your ML stack
Designed to seamlessly plug into your favorite storage, tooling, and service providers in order to build an automated data pipeline for machine learning that enables a closed loop feedback cycle.
### **Data Storage**

## Get the most out of your data
Lightly**Edge**![⟨20⟩-min.jpg)**Smart Data Capturing on Device** Find only the most valuable data directly on device‍](https://lightly.ai/</lightlyedge>)
Lightly**One**![⟨21⟩**Data Selection & Data Viewer**Get data insights and find the perfect selection strategy‍‍](https://lightly.ai/</lightlyone>)
Lightly**Train**![⟨22⟩**Self-Supervised Pretraining** Leverage self-supervised learning to pretrain models](https://lightly.ai/</lightlytrain>)
## We help customers to have up to
92% 
### less labeling costs
Data redundancy can not only hurt model performance but also create significant costs for data labeling, storage, and compute.
19%
### better models
Selecting the most valuable training data to achieve significant gains in accuracy. Leverage active- and self-supervised learning.
2.1x
### faster retraining cycles
Manage your data and machine learning pipeline efficiently and leave hacky in-house solutions behind for a scalable solution.
Data InsightsImprove your model by better understanding your data distribution, mitigating bias, and identify edge-cases⟨23⟩Smart Data SelectionUse a combination of model predictions, embeddings, and metadata to reach your desired data model training distribution⟨24⟩Automate Pipeline ManagementManage data curation runs and keep track of new data for labeling and model training⟨25⟩

generated_description:
Lightly is a company founded in 2018, nestled in the tech-friendly environment of Zürich, Switzerland. It's a gem from the Y Combinator Batch S21, working under the clever premise of optimizing data labeling for machine learning teams. 

The core mission of Lightly is simple yet powerful: help ML teams identify and label the most informative portion of their datasets—specifically that elusive 1% that can dramatically improve model accuracy. This means no more wasted resources on labeling irrelevant data. By focusing on the right data, Lightly enables organizations to enhance model performance without blowing up labeling costs.

With a compact team of just five committed employees, Lightly has created a savvy set of products like Lightly One, Lightly Edge, and Lightly Train. These tools are designed to bridge the gaps in data curation, automating the process of selecting, capturing, and training machine learning models effectively. For those in machine learning, it’s a tantalizing promise—the ability to cut labeling costs by up to 92% while simultaneously improving model quality by as much as 19%. 

Brad Flora serves as a Group Partner, lending his experience and insight to the company's mission. And while small, the team has achieved noteworthy recognition, making headlines in platforms like VentureBeat and Forbes, highlighting their innovative approach and success stories from various industries including autonomous driving and smart farming.

The tagline—“Get the most out of your data”—has never felt more relevant, especially when you consider the headaches of data redundancy and bias that plague most ML endeavors. Lightly allows companies to manage their machine learning pipelines more effectively, cutting down on retraining cycles, efficiently managing data, and ultimately helping shape tomorrow’s cutting-edge technologies. 

If you're looking to deepen your understanding of your data and reclaim precious time in your model training processes, Lightly could be the partner you never knew you needed. For more information, check out their website at [Lightly.ai](https://lightly.ai).
